ACCESSIBILITY Use Tab to navigate

Access Code

Access codes are special 6 character codes that are given out by event organisers so that you can join their events. To get an access code, simply ask the event organiser through some mean of communication such as a website. In short, these 6 character codes are used to access an event.

Terms and Conditions

Our Contact Information

Rights

At any time your data can be erased from our database -

YOU HAVE THE RIGHT TO WITHDRAW YOUR DATA.

You data can only be seen by your coordinator for organisation purposes, yourself and us whenever we view our servers.

AT NO POINT WILL THIS 'APPLICATION' SELL OR RELEASE ANY DATA FROM OUR DATABASE.

YOUR DATA BELONGS TO YOU, AND YOU HAVE THE RIGHT TO DO ANYTHING WITH YOUR DATA. IF YOU HAVE ANY CONCERNS INVOLVING THE SAFETY OF YOUR DATA, CONTACT US.

How we use your data

We use the following information provided by you

  • First name
  • Last name
  • Email Address or Phone number


Your first name & last name is used to identify yourself in an event. Your coordinator can more easily recognise you and we can greet you by your name.

You email address or phone number is used as one of the unique identifiers of your identity. They are used for signin purposes and CAN BE SEEN BY YOUR COORDINATOR AND US.

Your coordinator uses this to verify and contact you if needed.
BY SIGNING UP TO COORDINATA YOU AGREE THAT YOUR CONTACT DETAILS CAN BE GIVEN TO YOUR COORDINATOR.

IN THE EVENT YOUR CONTACT INFORMATION IS ABUSED, PLEASE CONTACT US AND WE WILL DELETE YOUR ACCOUNT AND SANCTION THE INVOLVED ENTITIES.

Signed Out.
